document.full_text: fast retailing co  japan's leading apparel chain, said it expected a sales boost from shoppers seeking lighter clothing this summer as temperatures rise and half the nation turns its air conditioners on low to conserve power.
document.title: uniqlo sees boost from light clothing in power-starved japan
lines_and_colors: fast retailing co  japan's leading apparel chain, said it expected a sales boost from shoppers seeking lighter clothing this summer as temperatures rise and half the nation turns its air conditioners on low to conserve power.
